info.description: Almabase is world's most loved alumni management software to build alumni-centric programs to increase participation, donor engagement, and host engaging online communities.
info.title: Almabase

object_id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a form.
System generated ID to uniquely identify a form.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a form.

object_id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a giving page.
System generated ID to uniquely identify a giving page.

external_database_id.description: A system assigned unique ID for the record by the external database. e.g. System Record ID for Raiser Edge NXT, Contact Id for Salesforce

first_name.description: First name of the mapped record

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a record.

is_registered.description: Indicate if the mapped record or donor registered on Almabase

last_name.description: Last name of the mapped record

amount.description: The gift amount with two decimals.

completed_at.description: The date when the status of the gift is marked as completed.

email.description: Email ID used by the donor for the gift.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a gift.

is_email_new.description: Indicates if the email provided by donor already exists on Almabase records.

page.description: Giving Page associated with the Gift

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a giving page.

name.description: Name of the associated giving page

city_short_name.description: The short representation of the City, e.g. SF

country_short_name.description: The short representation of the country, e.g. US

gpid.description: The place id obtained from Google

name.description: The city of of the donor. Format: City Name, Short State Name, Short Country Name

state_short_name.description: The short representation of the state, e.g. CA

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a form submission/response.

user.description: The user on Almabase who submitted the form.

custom_data.description: Custom data dictionary associated with the field (This is not user data).

display_value.description: The formatted value entered by responders. e.g. Name of the File Upload.

field_id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a form field.

google_place.description: Google Location, when the field type is location.

label.description: The question/form field name on the form

value.description: The value entered by the responders. e.g. Link of the file, Selected Options, Text, etc.

external_database_id.description: A system assigned unique ID for the fund by the external database. e.g. System Record ID for Raiser Edge NXT, Object Id for Salesforce

is_default.description: Indicates to associated all the splits to this fund if no other funds are defined on Giving Page.

is_other_fund.description: Indicates that the donors of this fund have given custom fund name.

external_database_id.description: A system assigned unique ID for the fund by the external database. e.g. System Record ID for Raiser Edge NXT, Object Id for Salesforce

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a fund.

is_default.description: Indicates to associated all the splits to this fund if no other funds are defined on Giving Page.

is_other_fund.description: Indicates that the donors of this fund have given custom fund name.

amount.description: The gift amount with two decimals.

batch_number.description: The batch number of the gift.

completed_at.description: The date when the status of the gift is marked as completed.

currency.description: Currency used by the donor for the gift.

donor_address_line1.description: The address line 1 used by the donor for the gift.

donor_address_line2.description: The address line 2 used by the donor for the gift.

donor_city_place.description: The city used by the donor for the gift.

donor_email.description: Email ID used by the donor for the gift.

donor_phone_number.description: Phone Number used by the donor for the gift.

donor_zip_code.description: The zip code of the address used by the donor for the gift.

honor_message.description: A message for a gift tribute.

honor_prefix.description: A prefix for a gift tribute. Available options are in_honor_of, in_memory_of, in_support_of

is_anonymous.description: Indicates the wish of donor be be anonymous to other donors for this gift.

mode.description: Mode of Payment, either online or offline.

other_fund_name.description: When the donor selects a fund that's marked as is_other_fund, they add a custom fund name to attribute the gift.

page.description: The giving page associated with the gift.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a giving page.

profile.description: Mapped Record on Almabase. NOTE: The gift would be automatically mapped to a record with the email address same as donor email.

splits.description: The splits associated with the gift.

batch_number.description: The batch number of the gift.

batch_number.description: The batch number of the gift.

completed_at.description: The date when the status of the gift is marked as completed.

currency.description: Currency used by the donor for the gift.

device.description: Identify the device used to make the gift, e.g. pc, mobile or tablet.

donor_address_line1.description: The address line 1 used by the donor for the gift.

donor_address_line2.description: The address line 2 used by the donor for the gift.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a gift.

influencer.description: The public share link and private dashboard link

is_anonymous.description: Indicates the wish of donor be be anonymous to other donors for this gift.

is_donor_covered_charges.description: Indicates if the donor has opted to cover the payment gateway charges when making the this gift?
is_donor_covered_charges.x-ms-summary: Has donor covered the payment gateway charges?

is_email_added_to_profile.description: Indicates if the email provided by donor is added on Almabase record (irrespective of is_email_new status)
is_email_added_to_profile.x-ms-summary: Is Email Added to a Record on Almabase?

is_email_new.description: Indicates if the email provided by donor already exists on Almabase records.

is_profile_mapping_ignored.description: Indicates if the record mapping should be ignored.
is_profile_mapping_ignored.x-ms-summary: Is Mapping to a Record on Almabase Ignored?

mode.description: Mode of Payment, either online or offline.

other_fund_name.description: When the donor selects a fund that's marked as is_other_fund, they add a custom fund name to attribute the gift.

page.description: The giving page associated with the gift.

post_payment_form_entry.description: The responses of the form filled after the gift payment.

pre_payment_form_entry.description: The responses of the form filled prior to gift payment.

referrer_link.description: The website link to identify the source of how the donor visit. e.g. Donor visited the Giving campaign from Facebook, Google, etc.

refund_amount.description: The amount refunded to the donor. If the whole amount is refunded, the status of the gift would be refunded instead of completed.

splits.description: The splits associated with the gift.

transaction.description: The online payment transaction associated with the gift.

utm_campaign.description: Used for keyword analysis. utm_campaign identify a specific product promotion or strategic campaign. e.g. annual_fund_2020

utm_medium.description: utm_medium identify a medium such as email or cost-per- click. e.g. cpc

utm_source.description: utm_source identify a search engine, newsletter name, or other source. e.g. Google

amount.description: The amount of the gift split.

fund.description: The fund associated with the gift split.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a fund.

amount.description: The amount of the gift split.

fund.description: The fund associated with the gift split.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a gift split.
System generated ID to uniquely identify a gift.

name.description: Name of the associated Giving Page.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a giving page.

dashboard_url.description: The private dashboard of the donor to monitor the number of page visits and gifts influenced by them

page_share_url.description: The public link of giving page/campaign of donor to track the influence on visits to Giving Page and the gifts.

name.description: The city of of the donor. Format: City Name, Short State Name, Short Country Name

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a payment account.

name.description: The name of the payment account.

type.description: The name of the payment gateway.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a record.

external_database_id.description: A system assigned unique ID for the record by the external database. e.g. System Record ID for Raiser Edge NXT, Contact Id for Salesforce

first_name.description: First name of the mapped record

formatted_name.description: Full name of the mapped record

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a record.

is_registered.description: Indicate if the mapped record or donor registered on Almabase

last_name.description: Last name of the mapped record

present_picture.description: The url of the record picture

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a recurring gift.

account.description: The payment account associated with the transaction, e.g. BBMS, Stripe, Paypal, etc.

amount.description: Amount with two decimals associated with Transaction.

amount_charged.description: The amount charged by the Payment Gateway and Almabase

amount_refunded.description: The amount refunded for this transaction.

created_at.description: The time of creating of this transaction.

currency.description: Currency used by the donor for the transaction.

failure_reason.description: The transaction failure reason returned by the payment gateway.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a transaction.

status.description:
Status of the transaction. - 1 (Unprocessed) - 2 (Succeeded) - 3 (Failed) - 4 (Pending) - 5 (Error)
NOTE: These status are associated with the status of transaction by the Payment Gateway

transaction_id.description: The unique ID generated by the payment gateway to identify the transaction. e.g. Blackbaud Merchant Services (BBMS) transaction ID, or Stripe Charge ID, Paypal transaction ID

external_database_id.description: A system assigned unique ID for the record by the external database. e.g. System Record ID for Raiser Edge NXT, Contact Id for Salesforce

first_name.description: First name of the mapped record

formatted_name.description: Full name of the mapped record

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a record.

is_registered.description: Indicate if the mapped record or donor registered on Almabase

last_name.description: Last name of the mapped record

present_picture.description: The url of the record picture

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a record.

v1.AlmasightsApi.TouchpointCustomObjectA.description: Touchpoint body to create a new touchpoint

email.description: Email ID used for the activity.

touchpoint_type.description: Describe the activity, must start with a verd and use past tense.

trigger_type.description: Trigger for the the activity, e.g. click, view, or search.

email.description: Email ID used for the activity.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a custom toouchpoint object.

is_email_new.description: Indicates if the email provided by user already exists on Almabase records.

touchpoint_type.description: Describe the activity, must start with a verd and use past tense.

trigger_type.description: Trigger for the the activity, e.g. click, view, or search.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a program.
System generated ID to uniquely identify a type.

email_addresses.description: List of email addresses of a profile

external_database_id.description: A system assigned unique ID for the record by the external database. e.g. System Record ID for Raiser Edge NXT, Contact Id for Salesforce

external_database_lookup_id.description: A custom user-defined lookup ID for the record in the external database. e.g. Constituent ID

is_login_email.description: Indicates if the user are allowed to login to the Platform using this email address.

is_primary.description: A primary email is used to send the automated emails triggered by the System. It is also used to send the bulk email to the profile. It's mandatory that only one email is set as primary.

source.description: The source indicate how the email is added to the database.

is_login_email.description: Indicates if the user are allowed to login to the Platform using this email address.

is_primary.description: A primary email is used to send the automated emails triggered by the System. It is also used to send the bulk email to the profile. It's mandatory that only one email is set as primary.

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a email address of a record.

is_engaged.description: Indicates if a bulk email is clicked or open, or the user reply to a one to one email

is_login_email.description: Indicates if the user are allowed to login to the Platform using this email address.

is_primary.description: A primary email is used to send the automated emails triggered by the System. It is also used to send the bulk email to the profile. It's mandatory that only one email is set as primary.

is_verified.description: Indicate if the user has verified that they own the email.

source.description: The source indicate how the email is added to the database.

email_addresses.description: List of email addresses of a profile

id.description: System generated ID to uniquely identify a record.

is_registered.description: Indicate if the record or donor registered on Almabase

present_picture.description: The url of the record picture
